name: Hit a duck in any training game
Land on fairway, rough, deep rough, fringe and green on one hole
30.0 points without multipliers (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
Par or Birdie on any Par 3 after hitting a tree trunk
Cover the 4 corner spaces (Chip-In Bingo / Bingo Clubber)
Between 74.9 and 85.1 points with one ball (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
340.0 points without x10-multipliers (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
2002.0 points across multiple games that get finished (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
Finish any course without landing on rough or in deep rough, no GiveUp
